DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Gel-One demonstrate superior effectiveness osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee pain compare phosphate buffer saline ( PBS ) injection .
DOC.criteria: Have knee pain Grade 1 3 KellgrenLawrence grade scale BMI great 35 kg/m2 Received intraarticular hyaluronic acid injection treatment OA knee within 6 month prior screen Had joint replacement target knee
